title: Pokemon Sinnoh Quest
description:
This can be played on P.C(using v.b.a included) or on psp
(if u have the emulator)

Pls give the feedback whether u liked the game or not or any bugs you find other than the ones mentioned



This is a hack of pokemon ruby game with all Sinnoh region pokemon
(if u dont know what a hack is visit pokecommunity)


SALIENT FEATURES

1) 385 Pokemon available in the game which are placed strategically throught the 
   game i.e ALL Sinnoh pokemon and 85% of pokemon from Kanto,Jonto and Hoenn 
                     !!!!ALL ARE CAPTURABLE!!!

2) All new SAFARI ZONE

3) Gym leaders,ELITE 4(including champion) and trainers uses completely different       
   set of Pokemon giving the players a New Challenge

4) Some d/p Exclusive attacks added like Aura Sphere,Dark Pulse,Close Combat

5) Pokemon can evolve in only 3 ways in the game
   (Rest type of evolutions removed)
   a) Level based evolution
   b) Stone evolution
   c) Attack-Defense base evolutions

6) Pokedex Entry of Sinnoh Pokemon has been taken 
   precisely from both Diamond & Pearl
  (This took a heck of a time)

7) Lastly the hack is 100% complete(story same as Ruby with minor script changes)



BUGS

1) Title Screen not made

2) The Wally event is not working properly(Ralts he tries to capture faints)

3) Although I have implemented National dex in Ruby still data of starter and some
   pokemon from other regions not recorded  
  (Although the information about Pokemon seen and  captured is shown correctly)

4) Cries of starters and only some Pokemon have been inserted correctly 
    Rest will be done soon

5) Some of the d/p exclusive attacks looks strange like Ominious Wind,Leaf Storm

6) Pokedex is activated after u get Running Shoes
   (NOT quite sure u can consider it a bug or not)
